  • Building packages
  • Edit on GitHub

Building packages¶

Building a conda package requires installing conda build and creating a conda recipe. Use the conda build command to build the conda package from the conda recipe.

You can build conda packages from a variety of source code projects, most notably Python. For help packing a Python project, see the Setuptools documentation.

TIP: If you are new to building packages with conda, go through the Tutorials.

OPTIONAL: If you are planning to upload your packages to Anaconda Cloud, you will need an Anaconda Cloud account and client.
